page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN GRAFFHAM
page.content: I.C.I. employ 600 people at Fernhurst, & some live in Graffham. They find new crop protection products, & develop & market to farmers & gardeners all over the world to make sure that they can control insects, pests, weeds & diseases that attack their crops. The farmers in Graffham will buy I.C.I products to control weeds in their fields of corn, to kill insects that might eat the corn, to protect the ears of corn from attack by moulds, rusts & other diseases, & to increase the yields of their crops. The goverment would not allow a company like I.C.I to sell a product if it was dangerous when used as recommended. To make sure that the products are safe requires years of testing in laboratories & under field conditions.
